title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.6 - Amicus curiae
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.6 - Amicus curiae

State Regulations

Upon written application the appeal board may by filing an
order permit interested organizations or other persons to file affidavits, memoranda or other papers amicus curiae in connection with an appeal. Those so
permitted shall not be considered parties to the appeal for any purpose
including participation in oral argument. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
